_header: Who that maketh in Christmas a dog to his larder

CamTCC1450.Transcription:
hoo so makyt at crystysmas a dogge lardynerAnd yn march a sowe
                    gardynerAnd yn may a foole of euery wysmanys counsayllhe schall neuer
                    haue goode larderne fayre gardyn nother counsayll well y keptt
CamTCC1450.Note:
Beginning with a couplet but changing to prose or blank verse
                    thereafter.
